name: 林冠仲
objective:
教學目標課程目標：執行計劃的現金流量計劃，並通過提供的財務指標進行分析，從而可以就是否方便執行項目做出全面的決策。

在本主題中，模型和項目評估標準為決策提供了必要的要素，尤其是在是否實施投資項目方面。學會識別和定義投資項目的主要成本效益參數”
Course Objectives：Execute a projected Cash flow planning, analyzing it by the Provided financial indicators that allow comprehensive decisions to be made on whether or not the execution of projects is convenient.

In this subject the models and Project evaluation criteria that provide the necessary elements for decision-making, particularly on whether or not to implement investment projects. Learn to identify and define the main cost-benefit parameters of an investment project "
